physical_appearance: The image shows a colour photograph. It features a lady. She is standing up and posing sideways, looking towards the direction where the photograph was captured. She is wearing her ethnic costume, with a turquoise top and a brown lower garment with flowery designs. There are also red garlands tied around her hair. The background of the photograph shows greenery and trees.
sgcool_label_text: This Chromogenic print on Kodak paper shows a young nyonya in a green kebaya.
title_text: Photograph of a young nyonya in a green kebaya
subject_terms_1: portraits women (female humans) folk costume Peranakan
subject_terms_2: Portrait photography Women Peranakan (Asian people) Ethnic costume Colour photography
